us.codecraft.webmagic.scheduler
接口 Scheduler

所有已知实现类：
FileCacheQueueScheduler, LocalDuplicatedRemovedScheduler, PriorityScheduler, QueueScheduler, RedisScheduler
public interface Scheduler

Scheduler is the part of url management.
You can implement interface Scheduler to do: manage urls to fetch remove duplicate urls

从以下版本开始：
0.1.0

方法摘要
 Request poll(Task task)
          get an url to crawl
 void push(Request request, Task task)
          add a url to fetch
 

方法详细信息

push

void push(Request request,
          Task task)
add a url to fetch

参数：
request -
task -

poll

Request poll(Task task)
get an url to crawl

参数：
task - the task of spider
返回：
the url to crawl
